channel.title: Need help about how to connect when server is no-ip
channel.description: Well im not a professional about private servers so i have to ask from you. I know how to connect through hamachi. But where i have to enter these no-ip adresses to get connected ?:) Thx :P

item.title: Need help about how to connect when server is no-ip
item.dc:creator: @x_pipstor_x x pipstor x
item.description:
@x_pipstor_x wrote:

yeah the hoster will have some numbers such as…5.83.93.7…thats the server ip…unless there is…a no-ip…then you have to use that

Read full topic
